songs.title: Abandoned By Heaven
songs.lyrics:
Believe me when I say
That in this omniscient land
When the cosmos were cursed
I suffered in blackened twilight
I saw the lies of heaven burn
And the obscured creation of hell
Staring into oblivion
In a web where angels fell
Pre
Feel dawn become silent dusk
Wrath of emptiness

[Chorus]
As we lived in chaos our gates were denied
Banned in our faith on our one selfish God
In eternal flames, abandoned by heaven
We fell from our divine grace
Into a cosmic grave
As the bolts of punishment fell
Thy pain made darkness serenade
Once an angel of light
Now condemned to wake in dark
I greet the nocturnal sea
Our communion in perished agony

[Chorus]
[Solo: Both. Solo: Mauricio]
Farewell to paradise
Farewell to sanctity
I mark my pace with blood
I am forever free
As we lived in chaos our gates were denied
Banned in our faith on our one selfish God
In this world of madness, Salvation will die
I see no tomorrow, as we blacken the sky
